Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui

Class JoinGameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.JoinGameController
public class JoinGameController
extends java.lang.Object
Handles the interaction between client and server during the phase of joining an existing Game. Allows:
  • choosing a Game room to join;
  • refreshing the list of the existing Games;
  • going back to the previous screen.

    • confirmButtonPressed

      Handles the pressing of the Confirm button.

    • backButtonReleased

      public void backButtonReleased()
      Handles the releasing of the Back button. Notices the GUIManager that the Back button was clicked, putting this input on the messageQueue.

    • refreshButtonReleased

      public void refreshButtonReleased()
      Handles the releasing of the Refresh button. Notices the GUIManager that the Refresh button was clicked, putting this input on the messageQueue.

    • confirmButtonReleased

      public void confirmButtonReleased()
      Handles the releasing of the Confirm button. Notices the GUIManager that the Confirm button was clicked, putting the input representing the chosen Game Room on the messageQueue.

    • chooseGameRoom

      public void chooseGameRoom​(java.util.ArrayList<GameView> gameRooms)
      Handles the creation of a table containing all the currently active Game rooms, showing:
      • the Game name;
      • the creator of the Game room;
      • the number of Players who already joined the Game room and the total number of Players required.
      Parameters:
      gameRooms - an ArrayList containing all the Game Rooms currently active
